translations: adv.不透水地；不渗透地：指物质无法通过或渗透的方式。
· The container is designed to store liquids impermeably.
这个容器的设计可以不透水地储存液体。

phrs.translation: 不渗透性, 不透水地

sentences.sentence: In an ideal world, of course, your personal life would be impermeably separated from your professional existence.
sentences.translation: 理所当然，这是一个空想世界。但你的私生活与工作的联系是密不可分的。
